meanings.definition: A large commercial aircraft designed for transporting passengers.
meanings.sent1: The airliners soared high above the clouds.
meanings.sent2: Many people travel on airliners for vacation.
meanings.sent3: The airliners seemed to be racing each other in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The airliners lined up on the runway like graceful birds.
meanings.sent5: The noise of the airliners taking off was deafening.

meanings.definition: The companies that operate such aircraft.
meanings.sent1: Several airliners announced new routes for the summer.
meanings.sent2: Airliners invest in advanced technology for safety.
meanings.sent3: The competition between airliners can be fierce.
meanings.sent4: The success of the airliners depends on customer satisfaction.
meanings.sent5: The airliners' logos are easily recognizable.
